name: 嵌入式系統設計
description: 本課程介紹嵌入式系統的基本架構、硬體介面設計及嵌入式程式設計技術，強調嵌入式系統的軟硬體整合概念。學生將在一個團隊工作中動手設計、配置、實施和測試一個嵌入式系統的原型，以瞭解如何設計實用的嵌入式系統。
goals: 瞭解軟硬體系統整合技術
瞭解嵌入式程式設計技術
建立嵌入式系統設計與應用的能力
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction to Embedded Systems Design

Week 2: Review of C Programming

Week 3: Embedded Processors

Week 4: MemoryArchitectures

Week 5: Interrupts

Week 6: Timer and Pulse-Width Modulation

Week 7: AnalogInput and Output

Week 8: Midterm

Week 9: Multitasking

Week 10: Scheduling

Week 11: Model-BasedDesign

Week 12: Dynamic Modeling

Week 13: State Machines

Week 14: Execution TimeAnalysis

Week 15: Final

Week 16: Project Presentation and Demo

methodologies.note: 兩人為一組，進行作業分工與專題製作
作業繳交及測驗方式進行
